entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:59 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 12:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle mixed with light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle mixed with light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:04 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
